mapper.select: select c.*, u.avatar, u.nickname, a.title, a.id as article_id from nb_comment c left join nb_article a on a.id = c.article_id left join nb_user u on u.id = c.user_id order by c.post desc limit 1
SELECT count(1) FROM nb_comment WHERE DATE_FORMAT(post, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT a.id AS article_id, c.id AS floorId, DATE_FORMAT(c.post, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS reply_time, a.title, u.nickname AS user_desc, SUBSTR(c.clear_comment FROM (LOCATE(':', c.clear_comment) + 1)) AS reply_content FROM nb_comment c LEFT JOIN nb_article a ON a.id = c.article_id LEFT JOIN nb_user u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE c.reply_id IN (SELECT cc.id FROM nb_comment cc WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId}) AND c.user_id != #{userId} ORDER BY reply_time DESC
select floor from nb_comment where article_id = #{articleId} order by floor desc limit 1
